name: HepatitisATestsForHepatitisAVirusNucleicAcid
title: Hepatitis A (Tests for hepatitis A virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab test names to detect Hepatitis A virus nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify laboratory tests names),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Hepatitis A virus probe),(Exclusion Criteria: System = "Plas^donor" or ""Plasma from donor"
Interpretation test)
